data.message: He has not turned his back in his country ffs, he went back to Detroit he will not move tae Scotland ffs, believe that when a see it, and trump is a total twat that much is true

replies.message: Penelope Thanou Nicola maybe i didnt made it to his concert this time but thanks sharing your moments videos with me letting me se him live at the direct time maybe not but one day after what the deal , i saw the whole concert , fuck trump yes , it was a blast bomb mosh out there , freedom of the speech never dies with eminem he will never let us down like that , maybe he can move to greece we never know what he does but he suprizes i love you sista even if we havent met yet through this fucking internet glass door we some i wish we will meet in person Μου αρέσει! · Επεξεργασία · Μόλις τώρα
